name: Elena Schmidt
description: Elena is a senior blockchain engineer with 6+ years of experience developing secure and scalable decentralized applications. She has led projects implementing smart contract-based auditing systems for financial institutions.

name: Ravi Mehra
description: Ravi specializes in security protocols and regulatory compliance in fintech systems. He has hands-on experience designing encrypted storage systems and ensuring GDPR and SOX compliance in data pipelines.

name: Yuki Tanaka
description: Yuki has 8 years of UI/UX design experience, primarily in fintech. She focuses on building intuitive dashboards for financial data and has worked on visualization tools for real-time reporting and audits.

name: Carlos Dominguez
description: Carlos has architected enterprise blockchain platforms for supply chain and finance. He is proficient in permissioned blockchain systems and has extensive knowledge of integrating smart contracts with regulatory frameworks.

name: Amira El-Fahmy
description: Amira blends backend blockchain experience with front-end development for seamless user interfaces. Sheâ€™s worked on financial apps integrating smart contracts and responsive UI tailored for financial professionals.
